reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown comfortable, sexy enough for romantic nights with their partner, and appreciate its loose fit that's not suffocating. The garment is soft and perfect for sleeping or lounging around, with one customer noting it doesn't feel like anything's on. While some customers find the material nice, others say it feels cheap, and opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true-to-size whil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable sleepwear
items.body: Beautiful and comfortable! The lace details are elegant and the fit is very flattering. The fabric feels soft and light â€” perfect for a romantic night or cozy sleepwear. Great quality for the price! ðŸ’• Read more
items.author: Olga

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sleepwear!
items.body: I love this nightgown! It is soft, super-comfortable and true-to-size. I have washed it several times and it still looks new. Read more
items.author: J. Hollingsworth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: Perfect for a hot summer night. Its nice and simple and the material feels lights weight. I like the little lace trim, just enough to give it a little something extra. Its tight enough to show off some curves, but loose enough to not be suffocating or tight. Read more
items.author: Aubrey Geller

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to description - great quality.
items.body: Like this. Comfortable, long enough to be tall girl friendly, and washes well. Not too tight. Material is nice quality. Looks like the photo. Its Not too fitted. If you want it to be sexier you may want to size down. Read more
items.author: Courtnina

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Longer than pictured
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: It is a cute chemise but much longer than pictured in the photo. Returning for that reason. Read more
items.author: Denise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need to buy this in more colors!
items.body: Love this night gown, itâ€™s not too short or too long. Really soft and comfortable to sleep in or just lounge in bed. Good material and keeps me from getting too hot. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible materials, feels like plastic on your skin
items.body: I regrettably washed these before trying on - won't be able to return now. The material felt fine out of the package but once I had it on, it felt hot and like wearing plastic. I don't know how anyone sleeps in this. Read more
items.author: Donna L

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White Leaf, Cherry Blossoms, Dark Grey, Red Cherry, Dusty Pink, Rose, Army Green, Black, Ginger, Orange Flower, Purple Flower, Light Royal, Blue Flower, Lake Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
